inbox.test.title: Inbox Test Error
inbox.test.description: It's a test error from the inbox.

email_address_invalid.title: Email Address Invalid
email_address_invalid.description: The email address you have provided is not allowed.
email_address_invalid.recommendation: Please go to listener settings and input a new address, then try again.

actions-list-connection_error.title: Action Connection Error
actions-list-connection_error.description: Your action was unable to connect to the API.
actions-list-connection_error.recommendation: Please check to make sure your credentials are valid, then try again.

actions-label-connection_error.title: Action - Label Connection Error
actions-label-connection_error.description: You were unable to fetch your current labels.
actions-label-connection_error.recommendation: Please make sure your credential grants you permissions to see labels.

actions-label-creation_error.title: Action - Label Creation Error
actions-label-creation_error.description: You were unable to create a new label with the provided parameters.
actions-label-creation_error.recommendation: Please make sure you have submitted a valid text value.

actions-label-update_error.title: Action - Label Update Error
actions-label-update_error.description: You were unable to assign the following label to these messages.
actions-label-update_error.recommendation: Please make sure you are using a valid text value.

listeners-inbox-connection_error.title: Listener Connection Error
listeners-inbox-connection_error.description: Your listener was unable to connect to the API.
listeners-inbox-connection_error.recommendation: Please check to make sure your credentials are valid, then try again.
